title: Interior Design Team Leader (Aluminum Door)
job_description:
Manage and coordinate the specialized tasks of the design team in charge.
Design and provide design consultation for the Sales Department and customers who require door design for spaces such as apartments, villas, luxury resorts, etc.
Work with partner manufacturers to ensure product production aligns with the approved design drawings.
Research and interpret technical documents, utilizing software to execute design tasks.
Support the Sales team in providing design consultation for customers' residential or project spaces.
Take responsibility for other tasks related to the Design Department.
Perform other tasks as assigned by the Department Head.
requirements:
Graduated from a University majoring in Architecture, Design, or a related field.
At least 3 years of experience in a similar position and in designing plastic doors, aluminum doors, glass doors, etc.
Proficient in specialized design software (3D Max, CAD, Corel, etc.).
Strong communication, presentation, and graphic design skills.
Ability to plan and develop strategies for the design department in line with the direct supervisor's objectives.
Dynamic, enthusiastic, and passionate about creativity, with a strong sense of responsibility and teamwork.
High sense of responsibility.
